#sidebar SyntaxSidebar
= `tagToElseStatement` =
[http://code.google.com/p/querytemplates/w/list Wiki] > [Syntax Syntax] > [elseSyntax else] > [tagToElseStatementMethodPHP tagToElseStatement]
=== Parameters ===


=== Description ===
Replaces selected tag with PHP "else" statement.


Method doesn't change selected nodes stack.  detached from it's parent.


== Example ==


=== Markup ===
{{{
 <div>1</div>
 <div>2</div>
 <div>3</div>

}}}
=== Data ===
{{{
 $data = array(
   'foo' => array(
       'bar' => array(true)
   )
 );

}}}
=== `QueryTemplates` formula ===
{{{
 $template['div:eq(1)']->tagToElseStatement();

}}}
=== Template ===
{{{
 <div>1</div>
 <?php  else {  ?>2<?php  }  ?>
 <div>3</div>

}}}
=== Template tree before ===
{{{
 div
  - Text:1
 div
  - Text:2
 div
  - Text:3

}}}
=== Template tree after ===
{{{
 div
  - Text:1
 PHP
 Text:2
 PHP
 div
  - Text:3

}}}
----


=== Comments allowed ===
